name: PRPOSE Strategies
description:
We are a Seattle-based strategic communications firm focused on purpose-driven businesses and organizations aimed at making an impact.
We work with both non-profit and for-profit clients that are passionate about using their knowledge and influence to impact change in their industry and in our world.
With strong roots in strategic communications, we are specialists in corporate social responsibility, sustainability, community relations, advocacy and awareness campaigns, social marketing, crisis communications, and digital storytelling.
From health care and education to natural resources and technology. From food and beverage to transportation and retail. We are proud to partner with clients that are redefining their work, leading their field, and taking on the challenge of engaging with issues that matter to them and to their community.
Creative, passionate communications professionals, we are invested in proving that doing the right thing is good for business.
